Name: Ma Family Luffa
Characteristics: fruit 2' long, 75 days to edible stage, 120 days to maturity. 1998.
Parentage: old Chinese heirloom brought to USA in 1970.

Name: Pusa Nasdhar
Characteristics: fruit medium-sized, rind relatively light green; from India. Martin's Vegetables for the Hot, Humid Tropics, 1979.

Name: Satputia (Hermaphrodita) -
Characteristics: fruit small, hermaphroditic. Martin's Vegetables for the Hot, Humid Tropics, 1979.
